thread.title: Trump Moves to Cut Costs for Prescription Drugs

author: Thomas M. Burton
title: Trump Moves to Cut Costs for Prescription Drugs
text:
The Trump administration is backing a set of actions aimed at lowering prescription-drug costs, including a cap on the dollar amount that American seniors pay each year for expensive prescription drugs.
The administration wasnâ€™t specific about the dollar amount for the drug cap, and some of the proposals would require congressional action.
